Modification_Detail.description: extracted metadata from PDS3 catalog and modified to comply with PDS4 Information Model

DD_Attribute_Full.name: average_orbit_peri_tdb_time
DD_Attribute_Full.definition: The average_orbit_peri_tdb_time element provides the value of the periapsis time of the predicted orbit. This orbit is based on the elements used to generate the uplink commands for the current mapping pass. It represents an average over the entire orbit, and is not the result of post-orbit navigation solutions. The elements should be used for comparison purposes only, since they may involve large errors. The predicted orbit elements are copied from the orbit header file of the ALT-EDR tape, or, if unavailable, from the orbit header file of the C-BIDR.
